SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.data

Interface EventRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
FirebaseEventRepository, MockEventRepository
public interface EventRepository
entry point for reading events displayed to entrants.

    • manualDraw

      void manualDraw(Event event)
      Forces the lottery to run immediately, ignoring registration timing constraints. Triggered by organizer/admin actions.
      Parameters:
      event - event object
